reviewTitle: Best fishing experience with Captain Giorgios.
review_details:
Friendly Captain Giorgios and his family members, excellent fresh seafood lunch and unforgettable experience. It is a good way for you to know how to fishing on the sea. Sometimes you could find the seal and turtles in good season.
友好的船长和他的家人，丰盛美味的海鲜午餐，很难忘的一次体验。近距离体验当地渔民的生活，还可以在清澈见底的海里游泳。
